doc.description:
This module is written by mavCourse 2022 group 2. It was inspired by the orange_avoider. This module is used in combination with a color filter (cv_detect_color_object) and the navigation mode of the autopilot. The avoidance strategy is to simply count the total number of green pixels (track floor). When below a certain percentage threshold, (given by color_count_frac) we assume that there is an obstacle and we turn.
The color filter settings are set using the cv_detect_color_object. This module can run multiple filters simultaneously so you have to define which filter to use with the ORANGE_AVOIDER_VISUAL_DETECTION_ID setting.
